title: Sakhamuru
text:
Sakhamuru is a <a href="neighbourhood">neighbourhood</a> and a part of "Urban Notified Area" of <a href="Amaravati%20%28state%20capital%29">Amaravati</a>, the state capital of the <a href="Indian%20state">Indian state</a> of <a href="Andhra%20Pradesh">Andhra Pradesh</a>. It was a village in <a href="Thullur%20mandal">Thullur mandal</a> of in <a href="Guntur%20district">Guntur district</a>, prior to its denotification as <a href="gram%20panchayat">gram panchayat</a>.
Demographics.
 <a href="Census%20of%20India">Census of India</a>, the village had a population of , of which males are , females are with sex ratio 1089. The population under 6 years of age are . The average literacy rate stands at 66.88%.
Transport.
Sakhamuru is located 1km away from the <a href="Thullur">Thullur</a> and <a href="Guntur">Guntur</a> route. <a href="APSRTC">APSRTC</a> run buses provide transport services from Guntur to Thulluru.
